Heboh Ormas Kuasai Lahan Parkir Toko Ritel, Pengusaha Minta Dilindungi
04 Nov 2019, 07:02 by Trio Hamdani


Ilustrasi. Foto: Rengga Sancaya

Jakarta - Baru-baru ini heboh ada ormas yang ingin menguasai lahan parkir di toko-toko waralaba di Bekasi. Informasi yang beredar, ormas yang dimaksud bernamakan GIBAS. Bahkan infonya mereka ingin perbuatannya dilegalkan oleh Pemkot Bekasi.Wakil Ketua Asosiasi Pengusaha Ritel Indonesia (Aprindo) Tutum Rahanta mengatakan, dari informasi yang dia ketahui ormas atau LSM ini ingin menguasai lahan parkir di toko waralaba."Di wilayah Bekasi itu kan penguasaan lahan parkir," kata dia saat dihubungi detikcom, Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).Kabar yang beredar bahwa LSM atau ormas tersebut bekerja sama dengan pemerintah daerah setempat. Berkaitan dengan itu, Tutum tak mengetahui pasti bagaimana kerja samanya. "Nah bagaimana bahwa LSM itu ada kerja sama dengan Pemda sebetulnya silahkan Pemda yang selesaikan bahwa mereka itu bagaimana kerja samanya gitu," ujarnya.Sementara pihaknya sebagai pelaku usaha hanya ingin mendapatkan kepastian perlindungan dari pemerintah."Intinya bagi kami lebih kepada apapun yang Pemda lakukan Pemda harus melindungi kita sebagai pelaku usaha benar, dari segala tata cara aturan dan apapun yang mereka kerja samakan gitu," jelasnya."Bukan hanya parkir. Kami ini kan pelaku usaha, (ingin dilindungi) dari segala gangguan apapun lah sifatnya. Kalau itu kan masalah case-nya parkir tadi videonya (yang viral). Tapi kalau kata kata saya lebih perlindungan dari segala aktivitas usaha kami," tambahnya.Simak Video "Ritel Berguguran, 6 Gerai Giant Dikabarkan akan Tutup"[Gambas:Video 20detik](toy/fdl)

Splashy Civil Society Organized Retail Shop Parking Lot, Entrepreneurs Ask to be Protected
Nov 04 2019, 07:02 by Trio Hamdani


Illustration. Photo: Rengga Sancaya

Jakarta - Recently there was an uproar in organizations that wanted to control parking spaces in franchise shops in Bekasi. Information circulating, the organization referred to is called GIBAS. In fact, they want their actions to be legalized by the Bekasi City Government. Deputy Chairperson of the Indonesian Retail Business Association (Aprindo) Tutum Rahanta said, from the information he knew, this NGO or organization wanted to control the parking lot in a franchise store. " "he said when contacted by AFP, Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019). News is circulating that the NGO or mass organization is working with local government. Related to this, Tutum did not know for sure how to cooperate. "Now, how can the NGO collaborate with the Regional Government? Please, please the Regional Government, which completes their cooperation," he said. Meanwhile, as business actors, they only want to get certainty of protection from the government. "The point is that we are more concerned with what the Regional Government does. The local government must protect us as true business actors, from all the rules and regulations and whatever they work in like that, "he explained." Not just parking. We are business people, (want to be protected) from any interference whatsoever nature. the problem was the parking case, the video (which was viral). But if my words are more protective of all our business activities, "he added. Watch Video" Retail Drops, 6 Giant Outlets are rumored to be Closed "[Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (toy / fdl)
